title: How to Draw a Rabbid from Rayman Raving Rabbids 2

steps.headline: Draw 2 simple circles.
steps.description: Option: make 2 squares first it will help.

steps.headline: Draw a plus on the TOP circle.
steps.description: It will help while drawing the face.

steps.headline: Draw 2 lines for the neck.
steps.description: Do the same  for the other side.

steps.headline: Draw 2 more circles on top of the top circle(aka head).
Now draw lines connecting the small circles to the top circle.
steps.description: These will   be the ears. Do the same for the other side.

steps.headline: Draw the feet.
steps.description: They should look like 2 small rectangles. Note: the feet should not be completely straight they should be a LITTLE curved.

steps.headline: Draw the arms.
steps.description: Make them like a really long U. do the same with the other side.

steps.headline: Draw the hands they should be small Us around the tip of the arms.
Time to put the lines on the face into use.
steps.description: Draw a face on the lines. They should all be perfectly even.

steps.headline: Now add detail and slightly erase the lines that overlap.
steps.description: Don’t worry if your bunny looks dumb you just have to keep trying. PS all bunnies look dumb even if you’re a pro.

steps.headline: Use color.
steps.description: Note that if you want to make the mouth open the eyes must be red. Otherwise make the eyes blue.

text: Draw 2 simple circles. Option: make 2 squares first it will help. Draw a plus on the TOP circle. It will help while drawing the face. Draw 2 lines for the neck. Do the same  for the other side. Draw 2 more circles on top of the top circle(aka head).  Now draw lines connecting the small circles to the top circle. These will   be the ears. Do the same for the other side. Draw the feet. They should look like 2 small rectangles. Note: the feet should not be completely straight they should be a LITTLE curved. Draw the arms. Make them like a really long U. do the same with the other side. Draw the hands they should be small Us around the tip of the arms.  Time to put the lines on the face into use. Draw a face on the lines. They should all be perfectly even. Now add detail and slightly erase the lines that overlap. Don’t worry if your bunny looks dumb you just have to keep trying. PS all bunnies look dumb even if you’re a pro. Use color. Note that if you want to make the mouth open the eyes must be red. Otherwise make the eyes blue.
